mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_news( title, content, cover_url, publish_time, author, status, view_count, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{coverUrl}, #{publishTime}, #{author}, #{status}, #{viewCount}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_news SET title = #{news.title}, content = #{news.content}, cover_url = #{news.coverUrl}, publish_time = #{news.publishTime}, author = #{news.author}, status = #{news.status} WHERE id = #{news.id} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_news WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM t_news WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY publish_time DESC
